title: Top 10 PSU performers in CY24. Here's how much they have returned
description: As we are at the fag end of 2024, a look back at the performance of PSU stocks shows BSE PSU index delivering nearly 29% in the last one year. This is higher than the 11% returns by the BSE Sensex in the same period. In this, top 10 stocks have given returns between 139% and 48% this year. Here's the list:

This is higher than the 11% returns by the BSE Sensex in the same period. In this, top 10 stocks have given returns between 139% and 48% this year. Here's the list: PSU Winners

This is higher than the 11% returns by the BSE Sensex in the same period. In this, top 10 stocks have given returns between 139% and 48% this year. RVNL shares' one-year returns stand at 145% AgenciesThis shipping sector PSU stock has given returns of 119% in 2024 so far. Its one-year returns stand at 129%. ETMarkets.comMazagon Dock Shipbuilders is a shipping sector public company, which has given returns of 106% in the CY24, so far. Its one-year returns stand at 123%.ETMarkets.comThe Housing and Urban Development Corporation Limited, abbreviated as HUDCO, is a government-owned company engaged in housing finance and infrastructure project finance. Its returns on a year-to-date basis are at 86% while one-year returns stand at 128%ETMarkets.comOil India is engaged in the business of exploration, development and production of crude oil and natural gas. Its YTD returns stand at 67% while one-year returns stand at 68%.ReutersErstwhile known as National Building Construction Corporation, NBCC has seen its share price rally 72% in CY24. Its one year returns stand at 80%.ETMarkets.comNational Aluminium Company is Navratna company and one of the countryâ€™s largest bauxite, alumina, aluminium and power complex. Its CY24 returns stand at 58% while its one year returns stand at 95%.ETMarkets.comBharat Electronics Limited is another Navratna company, which works under the aegis of the Ministry of Defence. Its one-year returns stand at 70% while the YTD returns at 57%.ETMarkets.comThe stock of Hindustan Aeronautics Limited has given 49% returns on a YTD basis. The aerospace and defence sector counter has delivered 56% in the past 12 months.ETMarkets.comIndian Railway Finance Corporation plays a significant role in supporting the expansion of the Indian Railways and related entities by financing a significant proportion of its annual plan outlay. Its YTD returns stand at 48% while returns of the past 12 months at 50%.ETMarkets.com
html:
Dec 21, 2024, 03:59:41 PM IST

As we are at the fag end of 2024, a look back at the performance of PSU stocks shows BSE PSU index delivering nearly 29% in the last one year. This is higher than the 11% returns by the BSE Sensex in the same period. In this, top 10 stocks have given returns between 139% and 48% this year. Here's the list:

Getty Images

Rail Vikas Nigam is a railway sector PSU stock and has given returns of 139% this year so far. RVNL shares' one-year returns stand at 145%

Agencies

This shipping sector PSU stock has given returns of 119% in 2024 so far. Its one-year returns stand at 129%.

ETMarkets.com

Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders is a shipping sector public company, which has given returns of 106% in the CY24, so far. Its one-year returns stand at 123%.

ETMarkets.com

The Housing and Urban Development Corporation Limited, abbreviated as HUDCO, is a government-owned company engaged in housing finance and infrastructure project finance. Its returns on a year-to-date basis are at 86% while one-year returns stand at 128%

ETMarkets.com

Oil India is engaged in the business of exploration, development and production of crude oil and natural gas. Its YTD returns stand at 67% while one-year returns stand at 68%.

Reuters

Erstwhile known as National Building Construction Corporation, NBCC has seen its share price rally 72% in CY24. Its one year returns stand at 80%.

ETMarkets.com

National Aluminium Company is Navratna company and one of the countryâ€™s largest bauxite, alumina, aluminium and power complex. Its CY24 returns stand at 58% while its one year returns stand at 95%.

ETMarkets.com

Bharat Electronics Limited is another Navratna company, which works under the aegis of the Ministry of Defence. Its one-year returns stand at 70% while the YTD returns at 57%.

ETMarkets.com

The stock of Hindustan Aeronautics Limited has given 49% returns on a YTD basis. The aerospace and defence sector counter has delivered 56% in the past 12 months.

ETMarkets.com

Indian Railway Finance Corporation plays a significant role in supporting the expansion of the Indian Railways and related entities by financing a significant proportion of its annual plan outlay. Its YTD returns stand at 48% while returns of the past 12 months at 50%.

ETMarkets.com
